value:
Linking a Nintendo Account is required
if you wish to back up your save data.

If you delete the app without linking a
Nintendo account, you will not be able
to restore your data in the future, even
if you have your Game ID or Friend ID.

Existing save data can be brought into
this app only when a Nintendo Account is
linked during the initial launch of the app.
It cannot be done from this screen.

(Check the FAQ for additional information
on linking a Nintendo Account.)

Link your Nintendo Account NOW! Your
save data, including Orbs, will be backed
up and may be accessible from this or
other devices.

Never linked a Nintendo Account to this
game? You can do so from Account
Management on the Misc. screen at any
time.

If you have played this game before, had
linked a Nintendo Account, and want to
access your existing data, you MUST link
your Nintendo Account NOW. You will
not be able to link your account once you
start to play the game.

The country/region setting on the
Nintendo Account that you
are attempting to link cannot be
used with Fire Emblem Heroes.

Your country/region of residence
setting in Fire Emblem Heroes
will be overwritten by the data in
your Nintendo Account.
Proceed with linking?

Nintendo Account link complete!
Returning to the title screen because
your information was updated.

You will now be using save data
from the Nintendo Account.
Because your save data has been
updated, you will now return to the
title screen.

This Nintendo Account has already
been linked to Fire Emblem Heroes.
If you wish to use the data linked to
this account, you must link the account
the first time you launch the app.
